Analyses

This section is aimed at collecting both detailed match analyses (video or text based) and short video sequences we want to attach particular importance to (eg. half-space dribblings, passing, usage of L2). but also describing the overall club progress. For gathering video material we set up a Youtube channel.

Match analyses

Cruyffian diamond

A video anaysis made by CGGyllen focussing on the connections and interactions between the midfielders of a cruyffian diamond formation.

Video sequences

The playlists of our Youtube channel point out main issues happening almost every game and we need to work on.
